dialogue.name: DAYLY
dialogue.text: Welcome, welcome, fair traveler! Care to test your luck with a Mini Cactpot ticket?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Try your hand at the Mini Cactpot?

dialogue.name: DAYLY
dialogue.text: Very well, misssir. But remember: with the Mini Cactpot, prosperity's but a scratch away!

dialogue.name: DAYLY
dialogue.text: Splendid, misssir! Now, allow me to explain: Mini Cactpot is a game of chance, available to you thrice every day.

dialogue.name: DAYLY
dialogue.text: Playing is simplicity itself: just guess the value of the covered numbers to win it big. If Nymeia's grace is with you, you'll be rewarded with Manderville Gold Saucer points galore!

dialogue.name: DAYLY
dialogue.text: So, misssir...do you feel lucky?

dialogue.name: DAYLY
dialogue.text: You can now purchase Mini Cactpot tickets.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can now purchase up to three Mini Cactpot tickets per day.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The counter for Mini Cactpot tickets resets daily at [Reset]12345678910111212 p.m.a.m. (Earth time).

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Each Mini Cactpot ticket has nine slots arranged in a three-by-three grid. Each slot is randomly assigned a number from one to nine. When you purchase a ticket, a single number will be revealed.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: To play, uncover any three other numbers. Based on that information, guess the sum of each line.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Finally, select a single line. The payout of MGP will depend upon the total sum of the line you have chosen.
